edible.cardDonate.text: Share fresh, high-quality surplus food with local NGOs. Help feed families and reduce community hunger today.

edible.cardListings.text: Browse all active food donations in your area. Claim available meals for distribution to those in need.
edible.why.title: Why Donate Edible Surplus?
edible.why.safety.title: Safety First
edible.why.safety.text: Strict quality guidelines and AI checks ensure all shared food is safe and fresh for consumption.
edible.why.impact.title: Immediate Impact
edible.why.impact.text: Our logistics network connects donors directly to nearby NGOs for fast, same-day pickup.
edible.why.empower.title: Empower Lives
edible.why.empower.text: Every donation helps bridge the hunger gap, providing essential nutrition to vulnerable families.
nonEdible.hero.subtitle: Turning unavoidable food waste into energy, compost, and soil health. Join our network of recycling centers and sustainable farms.
nonEdible.cards.recycling.title: Recycling & Composting
nonEdible.cards.recycling.text: Convert food scraps into premium organic compost or clean bio-energy. Find licensed facilities nearby to handle waste.
nonEdible.cards.agriculture.title: Agricultural Use
nonEdible.cards.agriculture.text: Donate nutrient-rich byproducts to local farmers for soil enrichment. Help build a circular economy that starts back in the earth.
nonEdible.info.title: Why Recycle Non-Edible Food?
nonEdible.info.methane.title: Reduce Methane
nonEdible.info.methane.text: Preventing landfill rot reduces harmful greenhouse gas emissions.
nonEdible.info.soil.title: Restore Soil
nonEdible.info.soil.text: Organic waste returns vital nutrients to exhausted farming soil.
nonEdible.info.energy.title: Create Energy
nonEdible.info.energy.text: Anaerobic digestion turns waste into renewable biogas.
